title: The Workshop
description: "Instruction in the art of submission is the dedicated goal of my workshop, where girls who are trying to be good, but sometimes can't help being naughty, are turned over my knee for thorough discipline..."City girl and military widow Nora Matthews never dreamed she would be every respond to an ad like that one. But, then again, she never dreamed that she would end up in a run down duplex in The-Middle-Of-Nowhere, Texas, either. Responding to this ad brings her into Jake's orbit...but who exactly is this mysterious, urbane man? And will her chaotic life cost her the place she craves at Jake's side?
author: Callie Coquille
